word_group.brief_definition: 不仅仅；并非仅仅；不只是

bilingual.source: The delay was merely a minor inconvenience.
bilingual.target: 延误仅仅是个小小的不便。
他仅仅微笑，没有说任何话。
这仅仅是个划痕，没什么大不了的。

bilingual.source: The book is merely a collection of short stories.
bilingual.target: 这本书仅仅是一个短篇小说集。

bilingual.source: He felt that her compliments were insincere and merely polite.
bilingual.target: 他觉得她的赞美是不真诚的，仅仅是出于礼貌。

bilingual.source: Merely helping a gift-giver gain access to other officials is not corruption.
bilingual.target: 仅仅帮助送礼者接触其他官员并不是腐败。

bilingual.source: However, merely having contact with children does not guarantee happiness in old age.
bilingual.target: 然而，仅仅与孩子联系并不能保证晚年的幸福。

bilingual.source: This was not merely a decline in reading paper books, newspapers or magazines.
bilingual.target: 这不仅仅是纸质书籍、报纸或杂志阅读量的下降。

yingyinNormal.en: Now the human beings on your planet are merely a resource waiting to be converted into capital.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在你星球上的人类仅仅是等待转换成资本的资源而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, God. That radical anti-abortion group? It's not radical. Why is something radical merely because you disagree with it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天，那个激进的反堕胎组织。它不激进，为什么仅仅因为你不赞成就要说它是激进的呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Observations reveal that if I merely insert "awesome," "like," "omigosh," and giggle at everything like it's a question, I will assimilate into the general teenage population.
yingyinNormal.zh: 籍由观察后得出的结论，如果我仅仅说“太厉害了，“简直”，“我的天”， 对任何摸不着头脑的事都咯咯笑的话，我就能融入普通青少年群体。

yingyinNormal.en: And I have merely staked my life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而我赌的是我的性命。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not impossible, merely un-possible. Got ya!
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题不是不可能，而是我们无法实现。抓到了！跑了！
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: We merely slipped a little package into your lower tummy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只是把一小包东西放到你的下腹部。

yingyinNormal.en: In here, we were gods. And you were merely our guests.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这里，我们就是神，你们只是我们的客人。

yingyinNormal.en: Cause you assured me that, that "Syndicate" was merely an exercise?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我记得你向我保证过，那个"辛迪加"只是个实验吧？

yingyinNormal.en: The Khan is your divine conduit? No. He is merely a man with a vision.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大汗是你的神咯？不，大汗只是一个有远见的普通人。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I never actually said she was coming. Old bean. I merely said I had invited her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个，我自始至终也没有说过她会来这儿喝茶，老兄，我只说我邀请过她。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: A life sentence for a rose? I received eternal damnation for one. I merely locking him away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过是朵玫瑰而已啊？我受到了一个永恒的诅咒。我只是把他关起来而已。

yingyinNormal.en: This is merely a statement of facts. Oh! You hired the assassins? You manipulated that whore, Mei Lin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这全部是事实啊。哦！那些刺客是你雇的吗？是你指使那个妓女美玲的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So your mirth is merely a discharge of nervous energy with no semantic content at all? My mirth. Classic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么说你刚才的欢笑声只是为了释放你的紧张情绪，没有任何实际意义咯？我的欢笑声，还真是谢尔顿的经典语录啊。

yingyinNormal.en: No. I was merely going to insist that the AUSA is trying to destroy evidence by expediting this execution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我只是坚持认为联邦助理检察官试图加快行刑过程来湮灭证据。

yingyinNormal.en: Because as you approached it, you wouldn't be pulled enough and would merely pass by with your path slightly bent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为，当地球靠近太阳时，将没有足够的引力将地球拉回，而就只是沿着切线方向离去。

yingyinNormal.en: But you didn't discover him. You merely noticed he was here, much like he did with 2008-nq sub-17. Sheldon. Oh, sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他不是你发掘出来的，你以前都不会留意到他，就跟他也没怎么留意过2008-NQ SUB-17。谢尔顿。不好意思。

yingyinNormal.en: We apologize, Your Honor. We agree there would be no immunity, but Mr. Gardner is merely using this deposition as a ploy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很抱歉，法官阁下，我们同意这不算豁免权，但是加德纳r先生只是在利用这次取证。

yingyinNormal.en: Her attractions are never far apart, and in between, well, merely walking her streets is to wander through picture postcards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴黎各个景点彼此都相距不远，在前往下个景点的路上，就像走在风景明信片般的享受。

yingyinNormal.en: But he has no idea what an idiot you are! Is this merely stream-of-consciousness abuse, or are you attempting to make a point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他不知道你有多蠢！你是在意识流地诛心，还是想表达什么观点？

yingyinNormal.en: First of all, let's understand that day and night are merely words invented by human beings to communicate simple conceptual constructs apropos of nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我们要明白“日”和“夜”只不过是人类造出来的词，用于简单恰当地描述这种虚无的结构概念。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 仅仅；只不过；纯粹是

word_family.mean: adj. 只不过；仅仅；最少的；最轻微的

examination_example.sentence: Under existing law, NHS trust "controlled" the data and DeepMind <highlight>merely</highlight> "processed" it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据现行法律，国民保健服务信托“控制”数据，而DeepMind只是“处理”数据。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Merely</highlight> helping a gift-giver gain access to other officials, unless done with clear intent to pressure those officials, is not corruption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仅仅帮助送礼者接近其他官员，而没有有明确的意图向这些官员施压，这不算腐败。

examination_example.sentence: Deep reading requires not just time, but a special kind of time which can't be obtained <highlight>merely</highlight> by becoming more efficient.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 深度阅读需要的不仅仅只是时间，而是一种通过提高阅读效率来获得的特殊时间。

word_usage.usage: not merely…but also相当于not only…but also。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“仅仅；只不过”，指仅此而已，并非其他。
意为“仅仅；只不过”，指就是这样、只是如此，强调单一性。
意为“仅有地；只”，指只有这些、不超过，强调不多于。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 仅仅；只不过；纯粹是

word_family.mean: adj. 只不过；仅仅；最少的；最轻微的

examination_example.sentence: It takes awareness, effort and courage to go beyond <highlight>merely</highlight> stating you believe something is a good idea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这需要意识、努力和勇气，而不仅仅是陈述你认为某事是个好主意。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: This was not <highlight>merely</highlight> a decline in reading paper books, newspapers or magazines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这不仅仅是纸质书籍、报纸或杂志阅读量的下降。

examination_example.sentence: The artist <highlight>merely</highlight> continued his campaign on the other side.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术家只是在另一边继续他的活动。

examination_example.sentence: However, <highlight>merely</highlight> having contact with children does not guarantee happiness in old age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，仅仅与孩子联系并不能保证晚年的幸福。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 仅仅；只不过；纯粹是

word_family.mean: adj. 只不过；仅仅；最少的；最轻微的

examination_example.sentence: Galileo was not <highlight>merely</highlight> ambitious when he dropped objects of varying weights from the Leaning Tower at Pisa.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当伽利略从比萨斜塔上扔下不同重量的物体并记录它们落地的时间时，他不仅仅是雄心勃勃。

examination_example.sentence: Readers also tended to share articles that were exciting or funny, but not articles that left them <highlight>merely</highlight> sad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读者也倾向于分享那些令人兴奋或有趣的文章，但不分享那些让他们仅仅感到悲伤的文章。

examination_example.sentence: Readers also tended to share articles that were exciting or funny but not articles that left them <highlight>merely</highlight> sad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读者也趋向于分享令人快乐和兴奋的文章，但是不愿意分享只让他们难过的文章。
